title: League Of Legends Setup Wizard Ended Prematurely
body: Ok I have a dilemma. So I deleted the shortcut of the game and when I try to re-download it says: "League of Legends setup wizard ended prematurely because of an error, your system has not been modified." I have been trying all different methods to re-download but I keep getting the same result. PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!

replies.body: Deleting the shortcut by itself shouldn't delete the entire program. You should be able to either grab the shortcut from your recycle bin and restore it, or goto the install directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends by default) and create a new shortcut from there!
